name: Treedbox Admin Menu
author: Treedbox

sections.description: Simple reposition of your Admin Menu on top. Compatible with Gutenberg ðŸ™‚
sections.installation:
Like always:
1. Upload treedbox-adminmenu to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
3. Click on \”Collapse-button\” in you admin menu (left)
4. Enjoy
sections.faq:
“Treedbox Admin Menu” changes #wpadminbar?

No, if you want hide or something else, use the great Adminimize:
https://wordpress.org/plugins/adminimize/

This plugin affect mobile version of admin menu?

No, Just de folded menu (Collapsed) in screen minimum width 783px.

Any more Questions?

treedbox@gmail.com
sections.changelog:
1.0.5

  • Compatible with Gutenberg and wordpress 5.0.3

1.0.4

  • Fix for wordpress 4.7.3

1.0.3

  • Clean and organized css
  • Fix margin left oversized

1.0.2

  • Fixed incompatibility with WP 4.2+
  • Include :hover black background color with opacity .3 for menu to make more visible
  • Fixed margin left extra on Mobile view

1.0.1

  • Compatibility with Multisite (Network);
  • Add screenshot-3 to prove that works

1.0

  • This baby born * . *
